description: Schema for AL Test Runner config file

launchConfigName.description: The name of the launch configuration to test against

attachConfigName.description: The name of the attach configuration to debug test against

companyName.description: The Business Central company to run the tests in

codeCoveragePath.description: The path to save details of code coverage to e.g. .//.npaltestrunner//codecoverage.json

testRunnerCodeunitId.description: The id of the test runner codeunit to use when running tests (130450 = codeunit isolation, 130451 = isolation disabled)

culture.description: The culture to run tests with. Defaults to en-US.

customBcContainerHelperScriptPath.description: The path to a .ps1 file that loads the BcContainerHelper module. This can be useful when you do not want to install the module on your local computer.
